Is putting into fixed deposit with guarantee interest ~3% good method to invest or save up?
Depends on your age / risk / investment profile.Typically more suitable for older folks with larger amount of assets since you won‚Äôt grow your wealth very much with 3-4% pa.
Yeah true..  more to low risk appetite n looking for something guaranteed.. stock market seems volatile and not guaranteed earnings

Tbills average around 3.6-3.7. SSB average around 3.2-3.3  so if you want something guaranteed and safe  can go for these 2. MMF is generally quite safe and average around 3.7 but there‚Äôs  still an investment risk involve

Hi all  new to all these so I‚Äôve gone for the UOB one account and just applied for UOB EVOL on 1st June for the cash credit promotion. My card got approved on the 5th and I am still waiting for the card but have just learnt that they have changed both the promotion as well and the cashback in August suddenly without warning. The promotion now is Apple Watch SE but only applies if the application is on the 7th June!? And previous cash credit promotion for June was no longer able to be found. Wonder if it is still worth using this card or just apply for an alternative card?

Don‚Äôt think I can apply for another UOB credit card for promotion anymore because I am no longer ‚Äúnew to UOB credit card‚Äù because of the EVOL approval for any promotions. So I‚Äôll just have no promotions at all?

1) what rewards did you choose? You can just fulfil the criteria to get the rewards and cancel it at a later stage2) the new nerf only kicks in in August so you have 2 months to still earn cashback based on the current tnc3) if the tnc states that you have to be a new to card  then I guess you have to stick with evol for now

You can still fulfill the promotion with UOB EVOL. The card is still top tier till the new t&c take effect.Afterwards you can look at UOB One card to fulfill your $500 spending and get at least 3.3% cashback  and a lot more if you spend mainly on selected merchants.
The reward initially when I applied for EVOL was up to $560 cash credit on 1st June. But the website changed & the rewards changed as well on I assumed 7th June to this new reward
Then you can fulfil the criteria to get the rewards and seeing if you still want to continue the card at a later stage. Main thing now is to get the reward since you have alrd applied for it

Can keep the card until they can‚Äôt waive your annual fee or if you want to be a new to uob card  cancel it( please read what date the promotion tnc states  rewards might be voided if card is canceled by a certain date)   then apply it probably 6-12 months later
https://www.moneysmart.sg/credit-cards/uob-evolThe initial offer can still be found on the moneysmart website but not anymore on UOB website
I don‚Äôt see anything regarding 560$ cash credit

‚ÄúUOB may  at any time and at its discretion terminate the Promotion and/or amend any of the Terms  and all persons shall be bound by such amendments.‚ÄùSo I assumed that have voided this promotion and replaced it with the Apple Watch but only takes effect for those who applied after 7th June. So nothing for those who applied from 1-6 June.
